message:
If anyone is interested: Microsoft is doubling it's OneDrive free storage for a limited time to 30 GB
To get the offer just enable the automatic photos backup
This offer is till the end of September
caption: Attachment UnavailableThis attachment may have been removed or the person who shared it may not have permission to share it with you.

data.message: OMG, they want to enable photo backup from WP devices !, leeh ! LOL, will try on the Wifi, 1 image = 2+MByte :D !
I think you can enable the auto backup to get the storage and then disable it again if you don't want to store your images on their servers
I think you could set it so that it only syncs when there is Wi-Fi, I have a 4.5 GB data plan so I don't really care :D

Hassan Aly Selim, I went to my OneDrive on the phone and without changing any settings I went to the Storage i found it 30GByte by default ! :) 
Rabena yekhaleeeky ya Macro :D

OneDrive syncs pictures only when there's WiFi by default. You can change that if you have a data plan.
My question here is different. If I'm getting 30GB for free, how is OneDrive making any money?

I've just checked my OneDrive account, I got 40GB for free.
15GB free by default.
10GB Loyalty because I signed up when the service first started.
15GB for Camera backup.
I'm using only 5GB
I don't think I ever need to pay for OneDrive storage. Thanks Microsoft, I guess.

I actually have 60 GBs, kol maye3melo offer to increase the size basta3'ello, the first one was when they decreased the size limit but said that if you already have an account you could follow a certain link and not get your limit decreased (3ashan loyal user mn zaman w keda :D)
I have 131 GB :D and not because I work for MS, there was an offer few months ago which added 100 GB for first 10k users to sign up or something
I have 245 GB in total , thanks to Bing Rewards. you can get extra 100GB for a year by using Bing in you daily searches for a week (you can get +60 Skype Minutes too) ;)
Eslam Hamouda: How did you enable Bing Rewards?!! I tried before and I couldn't due to country restrictions, did you use a proxy? :D

Hassan Aly Selim : hahaha No, most of time i'm using a VPN connection to a small VM on Azure based in US, so Bing is considering me US citizen based on the IP not the account settings, +Spotify and more and more :D we are suffering here in EGYPT but using a US VPN is like taking a deep breath on the internet :D
And I was happy with 30 GB :D

BTW, you can use Bittorrent Sync with Camera backup and have unlimited space.
http://www.bittorrent.com/sync/
If not for camera backup, just use BTSync for anything else :)
Are they trustworthy ?

Yeah I installed BTSync but as far as I know it p2p only, meaning that 2 or more of your synced devices need to be online so your files can move (no server to hold them for you), so it's not that useful for a simple laptop + phone scenario (as it will consume a lot of your data plan)
Great :( Also torrent is blocked at work

BTSync uses P2P to sync data between your phone and your computer. They don't store any data. It uses bittorrent technology.
If you want to be always to sync at anytime. Setup a server online with BTSync on it.
Digital Ocean has a tutorial on how to setup BTSync with a Ubuntu VM
https://www.digitalocean.com/community/tutorials/how-to-use-bittorrent-sync-to-synchronize-directories-in-ubuntu-12-04

LOL, this thread is amazing, I liked the word
أحباء مايكروسوف المخلصين :D 
245GByte :! D A7abebty aMacro :), 
Amr Eldib I am using this space in remote backup actually, important and work files need a space .
Found that MS give 15~30Gbyte without extra effort to increase space, Dropbox 2GB Free, GoogleDrive 15Gbyte+Mail, Box.net 50Gbyte, SrDoc 100Gbyte.
Just not so happy with the message I am getting on MS when try to get to the Reward program . " Bing Rewards isn't available yet in your country or region. " :-/
Mohamed Shehata hwa ana mesh fehmit hwa meeen elli 245 GByte ???
hwa soo2l ba2ah hwa ana lw 3andi two accounts for example like dropbox and one drive and i need to keep the same files synced between the two accounts feh tools bet3mel kedah ???
Mohamed Abdeen Read the above, and theoretically yes, you can Sync the same Folder into the two accounts, just adjust the settings for both Sync-Apps to read from the same folder .
